dn2:6.2: sañcayo → sañjayo (bj, s1-3, pts1), belaṭṭhaputto → velaṭṭhaputto (s1-3) | bellaṭṭhiputto (pts1)
dn2:13.3: kañcideva desaṃ → kiñcideva desaṃ lesamattaṃ (s1-3, km, mr)
dn2:18.7: pakkamiṃ → pakkāmiṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), anikkujjanto → anikkujjento (s1-3, km, mr)
dn2:20.7: mahākappino → mahākappuno (si, pts1), pavuṭā → paṭuvā (pts1) | sapuṭā (mr)
dn2:23.2: paro loko → paraloko (s1-3), sammaggatā → samaggagatā (s1-3) | samaggatā (mr)
dn2:26.10: sattannaṃ tveva → sattannaṃyeva (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
dn2:35.13: deva, jāneyyāsi, yo te so puriso → yo te puriso (bj, pts1, mr)
dn2:37.16: deva, jāneyyāsi, yo te so puriso → yo te puriso (bj, pts1)
dn2:42.1: sīlasampanno, indriyesu guttadvāro → bhojane mattaññū (bj, mr)
dn2:44.3: Pisuṇaṃ vācaṃ → pisuṇāvācaṃ (pts1), samaggarato → samaggarāmo (bj), anuppadātā → anuppādātā (pts1)
dn2:51.2: nāḷikaṃ asiṃ → khaggaṃ (bj, pts1) | asiṃ khaggaṃ (s1-3, km) | khaggaṃ asiṃ (mr)
dn2:52.2: janapadakathaṃ itthikathaṃ → itthikathaṃ purisakathaṃ (bj, s1, s2, pts1) | itthīkathaṃ purisakathaṃ (s3) | itthikathaṃ purisakathaṃ kumārakathaṃ kumārikathaṃ (mr)
dn2:69.3: byantiṃ kareyya → byantīkareyya (bj, s1-3, km) | vyantikareyya (pts1)
dn2:70.5: na ca me → nacassa me (bj, mr)
dn2:80.1: paripphuṭāni → paripphaṭāni (s1-3) | paripphuṭṭhāni (pts1), nāssa → nassā (bj), parisannāni → abhisannāni (s2, s3) | abhisandāni parisandāni (mr)
dn2:83.1: So → puna caparaṃ mahārāja bhikkhu so (bj, mr)
dn2:84.2: pītaṃ vā lohitaṃ vā → pītakaṃ vā lohitakaṃ vā (mr)
dn2:86.1: īsikaṃ → isikaṃ (bj, s1-3) | isīkaṃ (pts1), Seyyathā → seyyathāpi (bj, pts1), pavāheyya → pabbāheyya (s1-3, mr)
dn2:86.3: pavāḷhā’ti → pavālhāti (bj) | pabbāḷhāti (s1, s2, mr) | pabāḷhāti (s3)
dn2:96.1: rathikāyapi vīthiṃ sañcarante → rathiyā vīti­sañ­caran­tenapi (bj) | rathiyāya vithiṃ sañcarantepi (s1-3) | rathiyā vīthi sañcarantepi (pts1)
